title: Tiddalik: based on an aboriginal legend
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Pamela Abbey
brief_description: Based on an aboriginal legend, this animated film tells the story of Tiddalik, a greedy frog who drains the world of water, and the efforts of his fellow creatures to replenish the water supply.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Pamela Abbey
